enamel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a hard shiny substance that is put onto metal, clay etc for decoration or protection
enamel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the hard smooth outer surface of your teeth
enamel.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a type of paint that produces a shiny surface when it is dry
enamel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to cover or decorate with enamel
